analysis.Summary: This file defines and exports the Reports module for the application, providing an initialization function that registers the reports store and placeholder sections for routes and view components.
analysis.Purpose: To encapsulate setup logic for the 'reports' feature: integrating its Vuex-like store slice into the main store and preparing the module for future routing and component registration.

Components.name: ModuleReports
Components.responsibility: Main module object exposing the initialization method and grouping sub-modules (store, router, components).

Functions.name: initializeReports
Functions.description: Initializes the reports module by adding its store to the global store and (optionally) setting up routing.

parameters.name: router
parameters.description: Router instance for dynamic route registration.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Configuration options; supports `route` property to override default parent route name.

analysis.Usage: Imported via `import ModuleReports from 'modules/reports/reports.client.js'` and initialized in the app bootstrap with `ModuleReports.initialize(app, store, router, options)`.
Notes: Routing and view components are currently commented out and meant for future extension.
The default parent route key is `'Home'`, configurable via `options.route`.
